languages.text: "Я лишь говорю правду, элантах. Однако прошу, не совершай ошибок своего вида — в моих словах нет ни намеков, ни призыва к действиям. Твоя душа... сияет ярко в этом мире. Я тебя вижу — и это неизменно. Вот и все".

"I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."
languages.original_text: "Я лишь говорю правду, элантах. Однако прошу, не совершай ошибок своего вида — в моих словах нет ни намеков, ни призыва к действиям. Твоя душа... сияет ярко в этом мире. Я тебя вижу — и это неизменно. Вот и все".

traits.locale_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

"I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

"I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

"I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

languages.text: «No digo más que la verdad, elantach. Sin embargo, espero que no cometas el típico error de tu especie; mis palabras no encierran ninguna insinuación ni te invitan a reaccionar en modo alguno. Tu alma... brilla con intensidad en este mundo. Yo te veo, y eso nunca cambiará. Es todo».
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: «No digo más que la verdad, elantach. Sin embargo, espero que no cometas el típico error de tu especie; mis palabras no encierran ninguna insinuación ni te invitan a reaccionar en modo alguno. Tu alma... brilla con intensidad en este mundo. Yo te veo, y eso nunca cambiará. Es todo».

languages.text: 「本当のことを言っているだけだ、エランタ。だが、種族にありがちな過ちを犯さないでほしい。我は侮蔑するつもりはないし、お前に行動を求めているわけでもない。お前の魂は…この世界でまばゆく輝いている。我にはお前の本当の姿が見えていて、それは永遠に変わることはない。ただそれだけだ」
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: 「本当のことを言っているだけだ、エランタ。だが、種族にありがちな過ちを犯さないでほしい。我は侮蔑するつもりはないし、お前に行動を求めているわけでもない。お前の魂は…この世界でまばゆく輝いている。我にはお前の本当の姿が見えていて、それは永遠に変わることはない。ただそれだけだ」

languages.text: “我只是实话实说，外界人。不过，我请你不要犯下你的同类常犯的错误。我这番话并不是在暗示什么，也不是在鞭策你去做任何事情。你的灵魂……在我眼前闪闪发光。我看到了这一切，这是不争的事实，仅此而已。”
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: “我只是实话实说，外界人。不过，我请你不要犯下你的同类常犯的错误。我这番话并不是在暗示什么，也不是在鞭策你去做任何事情。你的灵魂……在我眼前闪闪发光。我看到了这一切，这是不争的事实，仅此而已。”

languages.text: « Je me contente de dire la vérité, elantach. Mais je vous demande de ne pas faire l'erreur typique de vos semblables. Je n'insinue rien et je ne cherche pas à vous pousser à agir. Votre âme... resplendit en ce monde. Je vous vois, et cela ne changera jamais. C'est tout. »
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: « Je me contente de dire la vérité, elantach. Mais je vous demande de ne pas faire l'erreur typique de vos semblables. Je n'insinue rien et je ne cherche pas à vous pousser à agir. Votre âme... resplendit en ce monde. Je vous vois, et cela ne changera jamais. C'est tout. »

languages.text: "Ich spreche nur die Wahrheit, Elantach. Ich bitte Euch jedoch, nicht den typischen Fehler Eurer Spezies zu begehen. Meine Worte enthalten keinerlei Andeutung noch irgendeinen Aufruf an Euch, zu handeln. Eure Seele ... strahlt in dieser Welt ungeheuer hell. Ich sehe Euch, und das wird sich nie ändern. Das ist alles."
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: "Ich spreche nur die Wahrheit, Elantach. Ich bitte Euch jedoch, nicht den typischen Fehler Eurer Spezies zu begehen. Meine Worte enthalten keinerlei Andeutung noch irgendeinen Aufruf an Euch, zu handeln. Eure Seele ... strahlt in dieser Welt ungeheuer hell. Ich sehe Euch, und das wird sich nie ändern. Das ist alles."

languages.text: "Sadece doğruları söylüyorum elantach. Fakat senden, türünün sıklıkla düştüğü hataya düşmemeni rica ediyorum. Sözlerimde bir ima veya eylem çağrısı yok. Senin ruhun... Bu dünyada parlıyor. Seni görüyorum ve bu asla değişmeyecek. Bu kadar."
languages.original_text: "I am but speaking the truth, elantach. However, I ask you not to make the mistake typical of your kind — my words contain no insinuation nor any call for you to act. Your soul... shines brightly in this world. I see you, and this will never change. That is all."

traits.locale_text: "Sadece doğruları söylüyorum elantach. Fakat senden türünün sıklıkla düştüğü hataya düşmemeni rica ediyorum. Sözlerimde bir ima veya eylem çağrısı yok. Senin ruhun... Bu dünyada parlıyor. Seni görüyorum ve bu asla değişmeyecek. Bu kadar."
